list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They are having an argument about/over whose turn it is.

list_definition.definition: a set of reasons; a piece of reasoning

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There are several arguments for/against the proposal

list_ex_of_english: He may be right about that, but his arguments do not demonstrate that he is.
Whatever the arguments for protection, high transport costs on imports are just as effective as high tariffs.

Plausible arguments for deploying the criminal law against such behavior can be made from grievance morality.
Success continuations take failure continuations as arguments, so they are second-order.
The arguments of the so-called new imperialism were ex post facto justifications of advances, they were not the original reasons for making them!

The throwtype verbs, on the other hand, are taken to basically select two arguments : an agent and a theme.
